siwil aarakshaka departhamenthuwa siya sebala / sebaliyange paurushaya, winaya ha pawathma ha nithigaruka bhawaya op nanwime aditanin prathama warata pawathwimata katayuthu salasum kara athi wolibol surathawaliya palath 18 k niyojanaya wana paridi pirimi/kantha washayen, ada saha heta sugathadasa gruhastha kridanganaye di uthkarshawath andamin pawathwimata widhiwidhana yoda atha.mema tharagawaliye samarambhaka dina pradhana amuththa washayen siwil aarakshaka departhamenthuwe nawa adhyaksha janaral riyar admiral aananda piris mahatha sahabhagi wana athara, awasana tharagaya saha jaya sanketha pradanaya 23 wanada paswaru 5.00 ta athireka lekam, salasum rajya aarakshaka, mahajana aarakshawa, nithiya ha samaya pilibanda amathyanshaya ha hitapu polispathi jayantha wikramarathna mathithumage pradanathwayen pawathwimata katayuthu salasum kara atha.
depirisa thulama ekineka pilibandawa kawaduna wirodha menma wairi aakalpa walin uparima prayojanaya gaththe me gatum kari depirisema chandayen pathwu palakayinmayi.
